author: ET CONTRIBUTORS
title: Covid anxiety hurting you? Tips to stay calm
description: Covid anxiety hurting you? Tips to stay calmIt's important to remind yourself that this is a temporary period of isolation.
content: By Dr. Zirak Marker I have been guiding and counselling a 23-year-old for the last three years. He has been diagnosed with Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD) and Anxiety.His symptoms started after his grandfather passed away due to multiple medical complicat… [+11986 chars]
